info.author: RedTurtle Technology
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Introduction
============

This product it's used to show video from mediacore in a portlet
You can select:

 * url
 * video security
 * video dimension

and then see the result

Credits
=======

Developed with the support of  `Regione Emilia Romagna`__;  Regione Emilia Romagna supports the `PloneGov initiative`__.

__ http://www.regione.emilia-romagna.it/
__ http://www.plonegov.it/


Authors
=======

This product was developed by RedTurtle Technology team.

.. image:: http://www.redturtle.net/redturtle_banner.png
    :alt: RedTurtle Technology Site
    :target: http://www.redturtle.it/

Changelog
=========

2.1.1 (2016-11-15)
------------------

- Plone 4.3 compatibility
  [cekk]


2.1.0 (2015-06-25)
------------------

- Removed unwanted dependencies
- Documentation
- Provided sane defaults if mediacore_properties are missing
  [ale-rt, daniele-andreotti]


2.0.0 (2012-11-23)
------------------

- package adapted in order to migrate to Plone4
- some simple modification in setup.py for dependencies
- change urllib timeout handling

1.0.1 (2012-07-12)
------------------

- aggiunte classi al template [nekorin]

1.0 (2012-07-12)
----------------

- Initial release
